channel.title: Bowzer's Client One of the basic clients. (open source client)
channel.description:
all i can say is, this is my 1st time releaseing my client. all i can is its one of the basic clients but its cool.
Client's name : Bowzer's Client.
Credits : me for a little part of it, maybe 10 % butter i think its his client so 90 %
Sorry got no pictures. :( but its a good client, and its open source client.
well here is download link.
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=6171a122c9c85d0fc2b435915e8821d7e04e75f6e8ebb871

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.
